    "To transplant a mature rose bush, choose a cool, cloudy day to minimize stress on the plant. Prepare the new site by digging a hole twice as wide as the bush's roots and enriching the soil with compost. Water the bush thoroughly a day before the move to ensure the soil is cohesive. Carefully dig around and under the bush to extract it with as much root and soil attached as possible. Place the bush in the new hole at the same depth it was growing before, backfill with soil, water deeply, and apply mulch around the base.",
    
    "Creating a new email account typically starts with choosing an email service provider and visiting their homepage. Click on the 'Create new account' or 'Sign up' button. Fill out the registration form with your personal details, including your name, desired email address, password, and phone number for verification purposes. Agree to the terms of service and privacy policy, then click on the 'Create account' or 'Register' button. Finally, verify your account via a text message or email link sent by the service provider.",
    
    "To conduct a science experiment on plant growth, begin by gathering three identical pots, soil, seeds, and fertilizers with different nitrogen levels. Fill each pot with soil and plant an equal number of seeds in each. Add a different fertilizer to each pot, noting the nitrogen levels used. Water the plants regularly and place them in an area with consistent sunlight. Over a period of weeks, measure and record the growth of the plants in each pot to compare the effect of nitrogen levels on plant development.",
    
    "When writing a formal letter, start by including your contact information at the top, followed by the date and the recipient's details. Open with a formal greeting using the recipient's last name, such as 'Dear Mr. Smith'. Compose the body of your letter, clearly stating the purpose and any necessary details. Conclude with a formal closing, like 'Sincerely' or 'Best regards', and sign your name below the closing. Finally, proofread your letter for any errors before sending it.",
    
    "To prepare for a marathon, first, consult with a healthcare professional to ensure you're fit for intensive training. Develop a training schedule that gradually increases in intensity and distance, including regular rest days. Incorporate cross-training exercises to build overall strength and prevent injury. Fuel your body with a balanced diet and stay hydrated, especially during long runs. Lastly, invest in a quality pair of running shoes and break them in during training to avoid blisters on race day.",
    
    "Migrating a website to a new host involves backing up your website's files and database from the current host. Purchase and set up the chosen new hosting plan and transfer all files and the database to the new server, often using FTP or a migration plugin. Update the domain's DNS settings to point to the new host's nameservers. Wait for DNS propagation, which can take up to 48 hours. Test the website on the new host to ensure all functionality is intact, making any necessary adjustments to configuration files or settings."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Procedure Outline",
  "description": "This subtask focuses on outlining steps for described procedures or processes.",
  "system_prompt": "Outline the procedure or process steps clearly from the following text in response to the question.",
  "data": [
    "Making a lemon tart requires patience and some skill in the kitchen. First, you need to prepare the crust by blending together flour, sugar, and butter, then pressing the mixture into a tart pan. Once that's ready, you bake it until it's golden. Meanwhile, you mix eggs, sugar, lemon juice, and zest for the filling. After the crust is baked, you add the filling and bake again until it sets.",
    "If you're looking to change the oil in your car, it's a relatively straightforward process you can do at home. Start by gathering all the necessary tools and materials: a new oil filter, new oil, a wrench, an oil pan, and rags. You'll need to warm up your engine for a few minutes, then turn it off and let it cool down slightly. Next, lift the car with jacks or stands, locate the oil pan, and drain the old oil. Replace the oil filter, then refill with new oil.",
    "To successfully transplant a young tree, the first step is to water the tree deeply a day before you plan to move it. This ensures that the root ball comes out with plenty of soil attached. Dig a wide berth around the tree to extract as much of the root system as possible. Prepare the new site by digging a hole twice as wide as the root ball. Place the tree at the same depth it was growing before and backfill with soil, tamping down as you go to eliminate air pockets.",
    "Developing a mobile application involves several key steps, beginning with defining the goals and understanding the target audience. Research the market to determine potential competition and gaps. Next, create wireframes and design the user interface. Then proceed to the coding phase, where you develop the app's functionality according to the designs. After coding, test the app rigorously to fix any bugs. Once testing is complete, launch the app on the appropriate platforms and market it to your target users.",
    "The protocol for treating a jellyfish sting starts with removing the person from the water to avoid additional stings. Do not rinse the affected area with fresh water, as this can trigger more venom release. Instead, rinse the sting with vinegar for at least 30 seconds to neutralize the venom. Carefully pluck visible tentacles with a pair of tweezers. Then, soak the skin in hot water (not scalding) for pain relief. If pain continues, seek medical attention.",
    "To build a simple website, begin by registering a domain name that reflects the content or business. Select a web hosting service to store your website's files, and install a content management system (CMS) like WordPress to simplify the webpage creation process. Choose a template or theme that suits your content or brand. Customize the template with your own colors, logo, and content. Finally, test the website to ensure it functions correctly and then publish it.",
    "The process of creating a successful blog post starts with selecting a relevant topic that appeals to your intended audience. Conduct thorough research to gather information and insights. Create an outline to structure your ideas clearly. Write an engaging introduction to draw readers in followed by the main content with subheadings, bullet points, and multimedia elements to make it more readable. Conclude with a thought-provoking or actionable ending. Edit for clarity and grammar, add SEO keywords, and then publish the post.",
    "Training a dog to sit involves a few repetitive steps. Initially, you should choose a quiet environment to minimize distractions. Hold a treat close to your dog's nose and move your hand up, allowing their head to follow the treat and causing their bottom to lower. Once they're in the sitting position, say 'Sit,' give them the treat, and share affection. Repeat this sequence multiple times daily until your dog sits on command without needing a treat.",
    "To prepare for a job interview, start by researching the company and the interviewers to understand their background and the company culture. Review the job description thoroughly and align your skills and experiences with the requirements. Practice common interview questions and prepare your answers, focusing on concrete examples that demonstrate your competencies. Select professional attire that fits the company's culture, assemble copies of your resume, and plan your travel route to arrive on time. Finally, get a good night's sleep before the interview day.",
    "When setting up a freshwater aquarium, choose an appropriate size tank and place it away from direct sunlight and drafts. Install a substrate, preferably gravel, then add water treated with a dechlorinator. Install the heater, filter, and thermometer, ensuring the water temperature is suitable for the fish species you intend to keep. Decorate the tank with live plants, rocks, and other decor to provide hiding spots for the fish. Allow the tank to cycle for several weeks before adding fish gradually."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Geographic Information Response",
  "description": "This subtask involves providing geographic details in response to location-based questions.",
  "system_prompt": "Provide geographic information from the upcoming text that satisfies the location-based factual question.",
  "data": [
    "Mount Everest is known as the world's highest peak, with its summit reaching an elevation of 29,029 feet above sea level. It is part of the Himalayan range in Asia and lies on the border between Nepal and the Tibet Autonomous Region of China. The treacherous weather conditions and challenging terrain make it one of the most difficult mountains to climb, attracting mountaineers from around the globe.",
    "The Amazon River is the largest river in the world by discharge volume of water. It flows through countries such as Brazil, Peru, and Colombia. Its vast basin is home to the Amazon rainforest, known for its biodiversity and the variety of flora and fauna not found anywhere else on the planet.",
    "The Sahara Desert is the largest hot desert in the world, covering most of North Africa. It spans across many countries including Algeria, Chad, Egypt, Libya, Mali, Mauritania, Morocco, Niger, Western Sahara, Sudan, and Tunisia. Despite its arid climate, it has been inhabited by various groups of people over the centuries.",
    "The Great Barrier Reef, located off the coast of Queensland, Australia, is the world's largest coral reef system. Composed of over 2,900 individual reefs and 900 islands, the reef can be seen from outer space and is one of Australia's most famous tourist attractions due to its diverse marine life.",
    "Venice, often known as the 'City of Canals', is situated in the Veneto region of Italy. It was built on more than 100 small islands in a lagoon in the Adriatic Sea. The city is renowned for its architecture, artworks, and the fact that it has no roads, just canals – including the Grand Canal thoroughfare.",
    "The Andes is the longest mountain range in the world and runs through seven South American countries: Venezuela, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Bolivia, Chile, and Argentina. It is also known for having the highest peak outside of Asia, Aconcagua, which stands at 22,841 feet in Argentina.",
    "Lake Baikal in Russia is the world's deepest and oldest freshwater lake. It is estimated to hold one-fifth of the Earth's unfrozen surface fresh water. Located in Siberia, it is home to a unique range of aquatic species, including the Baikal seal, the world's only freshwater pinniped.",
    "Antarctica is Earth's southernmost continent, containing the geographic South Pole. It is the fifth-largest continent in area and is covered by the Antarctic ice sheet, the largest single mass of ice on the planet. This polar region is characterized by extreme conditions, minimal wildlife, and no permanent residents, with only scientists inhabiting research stations temporarily.",
    "The Nile River is commonly regarded as the longest river in the world, flowing north through northeastern Africa. It runs through 11 countries, including Sudan and Egypt, and is a primary source of water for these regions. Historically, the Nile was crucial for the development of the Egyptian civilization.",
    "Death Valley is a desert valley located in Eastern California, in the northern Mojave Desert, within the United States. It is one of the hottest places in the world at the height of summertime along with deserts in the Middle East. Death Valley's Badwater Basin is the point of the lowest elevation in North America, at 282 feet below sea level."
  ]
}

Text Summarization.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.
subtasks:
{
  "name": "Abstract Summarization",
  "description": "This subtask aims to generate an abstract, or self-contained, summary that presents the core points of the text without necessarily using the original text's words or phrases. It challenges the summarizer to paraphrase and condense content independently. The goal is to create an entirely new summary that stands on its own while accurately reflecting the text's information.",
  "system_prompt": "Generate an abstract summary for the following input, paraphrasing to condense the core content independently.",
  "data": [
    "The global economy is facing unprecedented challenges due to the ongoing impact of climate change, which is disrupting traditional industries and supply chains. Experts suggest that innovation in green technology and sustainable practices is not only desirable but essential for economic survival. The transition to a low-carbon future is expected to open new markets and opportunities for growth, despite the initial costs and adjustments that businesses and governments will have to make.",
    "Recent advances in artificial intelligence have been remarkable, leading to breakthroughs in various fields such as healthcare, finance, and autonomous vehicles. However, these developments have also raised significant ethical concerns and questions about job displacement. The industry must navigate the delicate balance between innovation and its impact on society, ensuring that the benefits are distributed equitably while safeguarding against potential harms.",
    "The novel 'Winds of Change' follows the protagonist, Elizabeth, through her transformative journey from a shy, introverted schoolteacher to a leading activist fighting for social justice. Through a series of personal tragedies and the influence of new friendships, Elizabeth finds her voice and purpose, joining a larger movement that challenges the status quo and brings about significant change in her community.",
    "A recent study on dietary habits across various demographics has revealed a growing trend towards plant-based diets. This shift is attributed to increased awareness of the health benefits associated with such diets, including lower risks of heart disease and certain cancers, as well as the ethical and environmental implications of meat consumption. Supermarkets and restaurants are responding by expanding their offerings to cater to the demand for plant-based options.",
    "The documentary 'Invisible Threads' exposes the often unseen world of the fashion industry's supply chain, highlighting the harsh working conditions and environmental toll behind the glamorous facades. It showcases the stories of garment workers and activists who are pushing for change, advocating for ethical labor practices and sustainability. The film calls for consumers to consider the true cost of their clothing choices and the need for industry-wide reform.",
    "In his farewell address, the company's retiring founder reflects on the journey from a small startup to a multinational corporation. He emphasizes the importance of adaptability, vision, and perseverance in the face of adversity. He also credits the diverse and talented team for their part in the company's success, and expresses hope that the company will continue to innovate and lead with integrity.",
    "The research paper analyzes the effects of urban sprawl on local wildlife populations, citing habitat loss and fragmentation as major contributing factors to species decline. It calls for the implementation of 'green' urban planning and the creation of wildlife corridors to mitigate these impacts. The study highlights the urgency of integrating biodiversity considerations into city development projects.",
    "The biography of Harriet Tubman, an iconic figure in American history, details her life from her early years born into slavery, through her daring escape, and her tireless work as a conductor on the Underground Railroad. It chronicles her contributions during the Civil War and her advocacy for women's suffrage, painting a picture of a courageous woman who overcame insurmountable odds to help others gain their freedom.",
    "The city council's meeting focused on addressing the growing concerns over traffic congestion and pollution. Proposed solutions included the expansion of public transportation networks, the implementation of bike lanes, and incentives for electric vehicle use. A task force was formed to evaluate these options and develop a comprehensive plan aimed at improving the quality of life for residents while reducing the city's carbon footprint.",
    "A theological debate has emerged around the interpretation of free will in the context of modern-day faith practices. The discussion centers on reconciling the traditional teachings of predestination with the contemporary emphasis on individual choice and accountability. Scholars and religious leaders are examining historical texts and doctrines to provide guidance to followers who seek to understand the role of free will in their spiritual lives."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Abstract Summarization",
  "description": "This subtask aims to generate an abstract, or self-contained, summary that presents the core points of the text without necessarily using the original text's words or phrases. It challenges the summarizer to paraphrase and condense content independently. The goal is to create an entirely new summary that stands on its own while accurately reflecting the text's information.",
  "system_prompt": "Generate an abstract summary for the following input, paraphrasing to condense the core content independently.",
  "data": [
    "The local municipality has recently initiated a project aiming to enhance the community's public transport system. By increasing the number of buses, and introducing new routes that better cover residential areas, they seek to reduce traffic congestion and improve air quality. The project is also designed to be economically beneficial, offering discounted fares to students and the elderly, and expected to encourage a shift from individual car use to public transportation.",
    
    "In her latest novel, Elizabeth crafts a world where the boundary between technology and humanity is blurred. The story revolves around the protagonist, Jane, who struggles with the ethical dilemmas posed by the rise of artificial intelligence. As Jane navigates a society on the brink of a technological revolution, she must confront her own fears and prejudices, ultimately leading to her growth and acceptance of change.",
    
    "A recent study has examined the effects of a short-term fasting diet on human health indicators, such as cholesterol levels and blood pressure. Participants underwent a controlled regimen of 16-hour fasting intervals followed by 8-hour eating windows for a month. Preliminary results suggest potential benefits, including weight loss and improved metabolic responses, though researchers emphasize the need for long-term studies to confirm these findings.",
    
    "Global tech giant X-Corp announced its breakthrough in quantum computing technology, promising to revolutionize data processing speeds. By leveraging the principles of quantum mechanics, they have developed a new processor that significantly outperforms current supercomputers. This advancement is poised to have far-reaching impacts across various industries, from pharmaceuticals to cryptography, and could redefine the landscape of computational power in the next decade.",
    
    "In a recent city council meeting, discussion focused on the proposal to revitalize the downtown area, which has seen economic decline over the past years. The revitalization plan includes developing affordable housing, attracting new businesses, and refurbishing public spaces. The council aims to foster community engagement by incorporating local artists in public works projects and organizing community events to stimulate economic growth and civic pride.",
    
    "The health department has issued an advisory on the spread of a new strain of flu virus, which has been rapidly transmitted in several regions. Recommended preventive measures include frequent hand-washing, wearing masks in crowded places, and getting the flu vaccine. Moreover, clinics are being equipped to handle the anticipated increase in patient load, and the department is closely monitoring the situation to update the public on further developments.",
    
    "A research paper delves into the implications of climate change on migratory bird patterns. Findings indicate that rising temperatures and altered landscapes have significantly shifted the migratory timelines and routes of various bird species, with some now facing the threat of reduced habitats and food sources. The study's authors call for immediate conservation efforts to mitigate these impacts and preserve the biodiversity of avian populations.",
    
    "Evie's Bakery, a local family-owned business, has seen tremendous growth over the past five years, expanding from a single storefront to a chain of six locations. The success is attributed to their commitment to using organic, locally-sourced ingredients and offering a personal touch with home-style baked goods. Their next venture includes opening a seventh location and launching a line of baking mixes for customers to enjoy their signature flavors at home.",
    
    "An in-depth report was released on the integration of renewable energy systems in rural areas. It highlights challenges such as the lack of infrastructure and funding but also points out the significant opportunities for sustainable development through the use of solar and wind power. The report advocates for more government-backed programs and private investments to provide these communities with access to clean energy and to promote energy independence.",
    
    "To combat the decline of pollinator populations, a new conservation strategy has been implemented, focusing on planting native flowers and creating habitats that support bees, butterflies, and other pollinating insects. The program aims not only to address the environmental concerns associated with pollinator loss but also to enhance agricultural productivity through more effective natural pollination processes."
  ]
}

  "name": "Abstract Summarization",

{
  "name": "Comparative Summarization",
  "description": "This subtask involves creating summaries that compare and contrast key elements or viewpoints presented in the text. It requires the identification of similarities and differences within the material. The result is a summary that helps the reader understand varying perspectives or competing information on the same topic.",
  "system_prompt": "Produce a comparative summary by outlining similarities and differences in the following text.",
  "data": [
    "In economics, two prevailing theories about government expenditure and economic growth exist. Keynesian economists argue that increased government spending can lead to economic stimulation, particularly during a downturn. On the other hand, supply-side economists contend that lower taxes and reduced government spending encourage private sector growth. Both theories aim to achieve economic growth, but they differ sharply in methodology—whether the government or the private sector should be the primary engine.",
    "Vegetarian and vegan diets are often conflated, but they have distinct differences. Vegetarians do not eat meat but may consume other animal products like dairy and eggs. Conversely, vegans avoid all animal-derived products, including honey and gelatin. Both diets stem from health, ethical, or environmental concerns, yet they diverge in the level of restriction and the underlying principles concerning animals and animal products.",
    "The French Revolution and the American Revolution had far-reaching effects on the course of history. Both were inspired by Enlightenment principles and sought to overthrow an oppressive regime to establish a government based on the rights of the populace. However, the French Revolution led to a period of radical social and political upheaval, culminating in a dictatorship, whereas the American Revolution resulted in a more stable transition to a democratic government.",
    "Classical and operant conditioning are two fundamental concepts in behavioral psychology. Classical conditioning is a learning process that occurs when two stimuli are repeatedly paired; a response that is at first elicited only by the second stimulus is eventually elicited by the first stimulus alone. Operant conditioning, contrarily, involves learning through the consequences of behavior, with reinforcement and punishment shaping the likelihood of behavior reoccurring. Both involve learning, but they differ in whether the learning is associated with stimuli or behaviors.",
    "Solar power and wind power are prominent renewable energy sources. Solar power harnesses energy from sunlight using photovoltaic cells to convert it into electricity. Wind power generates electricity through the kinetic energy produced by wind turning turbines. Both types of energy are clean and sustainable alternatives to fossil fuels, but they differ in terms of reliability and site suitability—solar power is more consistent in sunny areas, while wind power requires windy conditions to be effective.",
    "The theories of general relativity and quantum mechanics are pillars of modern physics. General relativity addresses the force of gravity and the large-scale structure of the universe, while quantum mechanics explains the behavior of particles at the smallest scales. Both are fundamental in understanding the universe, yet they are currently incompatible with each other in certain conditions, such as those inside black holes or at the moment of the Big Bang.",
    "The literary movements of Romanticism and Realism are distinguishable by their approach to depicting life and nature. Romanticism, emerging as a reaction to the Industrial Revolution's emphasis on reason, emphasizes emotions, individualism, and the glorification of the past and nature. Realism, conversely, aims to depict everyday life and society with accuracy and without romantic idealization. Both movements significantly influenced literature, but they diverge in their portrayal of reality and human experience.",
    "In marketing, the push and pull strategies are two different approaches to product promotion. A push strategy involves taking the product directly to the customer via distribution channels, ensuring the product is visible at the point of purchase. On the other hand, a pull strategy relies on creating demand through consumer interest, encouraging consumers to seek out the product. Both aim to increase sales, but they differ in approach—one pushes the product towards customers, while the other pulls customers towards the product.",
    "The management styles of autocratic and democratic leadership differ significantly. Autocratic leaders make decisions unilaterally without much input from team members, prioritizing efficiency and control. Democratic leaders encourage participation, sharing decision-making with team members to foster ownership and consensus. Both styles have their applications and can be effective in different contexts, yet they represent opposite ends of the spectrum in terms of employee involvement and empowerment.",
    "While both yoga and pilates are low-impact exercises designed to improve flexibility and strength, they have different origins and emphasis. Yoga, with its roots in ancient India, focuses on flexibility, balance, and relaxation, incorporating breathing exercises and meditation. Pilates, created by Joseph Pilates in the early 20th century, is particularly centered on strengthening the core, improving posture, and increasing body awareness. Despite their differences, both practices offer diverse health benefits and can complement each other."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Technical Summarization",
  "description": "Technical summarization requires distilling complex, technical texts into more accessible summaries without losing key technical details. It involves translating specialized jargon into language that is understandable to a broader audience. The summary should accurately convey the original text's technical content in a form that is both concise and clear to non-experts.",
  "system_prompt": "Create a technical summary of the following content, making complex details clear to a non-expert audience.",
  "data": [
    "The process of photosynthesis in plants involves the chlorophyll pigment, which captures energy from sunlight, converting carbon dioxide and water into glucose. The glucose is used by the plant for energy and growth. This process also produces oxygen as a by-product. Photosynthesis is crucial as it is the primary source of energy for nearly all life forms on Earth and maintains atmospheric oxygen levels.",
    "Blockchain technology offers a decentralized ledger that records transactions across multiple computers. This ensures that no single transaction record can be altered retroactively without altering all subsequent blocks, which requires network consensus. Thus, blockchains are secure by design and exemplify a distributed computing system with high Byzantine fault tolerance.",
    "Quantum computing leverages the principles of quantum mechanics to process information. Unlike classical computers which encode data in binary bits that are either 0 or 1, quantum computers use quantum bits or qubits that can exist in multiple states simultaneously. This allows quantum computers to solve complex problems much faster than their classical counterparts.",
    "The theory of relativity, devised by Albert Einstein, revolutionized our understanding of space, time, and gravity. It comprises two theories: special relativity and general relativity. Special relativity applies to particle physics and cosmology, and general relativity explains the gravitational relationship between masses. Einstein's equations describe how matter and energy warp spacetime, causing the phenomenon we perceive as gravity.",
    "In machine learning, neural networks are inspired by the brain's structure and function. These networks are composed of layers of interconnected nodes or 'neurons' that process input data and can learn to perform tasks without being explicitly programmed. They are particularly effective for complex tasks like image and speech recognition.",
    "CRISPR-Cas9 is a revolutionary gene-editing tool allowing scientists to alter DNA sequences and modify gene function. It works by using a RNA molecule that guides the Cas9 enzyme to the targeted DNA strand, where it makes a precise cut. This technology has significant potential in treating genetic disorders, enhancing crops, and more.",
    "An operating system (OS) is software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs. The OS acts as an intermediary between users and the computer hardware. Functions of an operating system include managing the computer's memory, handling input and output operations, and facilitating user interface.",
    "The internet of things (IoT) refers to the network of physical objects—'things'—embedded with sensors, software, and other technologies, connecting and exchanging data with other devices and systems over the internet. These objects range from ordinary household items to sophisticated industrial tools. IoT has the potential to improve efficiency, economic benefits, and reduce human exertions.",
    "In computer graphics, ray tracing is a rendering technique that simulates the physical behavior of light to produce images with high visual realism. It works by tracing the path of light as pixels in an image plane and simulating the effects of its encounters with virtual objects. The technique is capable of producing highly realistic shadows, reflections, and refractions.",
    "Aerospace engineering is the primary field concerned with the development of aircraft and spacecraft. It has two major and overlapping branches: aeronautical and astronautical engineering. Aeronautical engineering deals with the technology and development of aircraft, while astronautical engineering focuses on spacecraft construction and the physical and technical constraints of space travel."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Technical Summarization",
  "description": "Technical summarization requires distilling complex, technical texts into more accessible summaries without losing key technical details. It involves translating specialized jargon into language that is understandable to a broader audience. The summary should accurately convey the original text's technical content in a form that is both concise and clear to non-experts.",
  "system_prompt": "Create a technical summary of the following content, making complex details clear to a non-expert audience.",
  "data": [
    "Utilizing a convolutional neural network (CNN), image classification tasks have demonstrated a high degree of accuracy in distinguishing between different objects within an array of images. CNNs achieve this through a series of convolutional layers that process pixel data and identify distinguishing features using various filters. This method enhances the model's ability to recognize distinct patterns, such as edges and shapes, which are then used to categorize the images.",
    "Blockchain technology offers a decentralized ledger system, which ensures security and transparency in transactions. Each 'block' in the chain contains a batch of transactions that, once verified, cannot be altered. This immutability is guarded by cryptographic principles ensuring that each transaction is securely linked to the previous block, making the system highly resistant to fraud and tampering.",
    "Quantum computing takes advantage of quantum mechanics by processing information in a fundamentally different way than classical computers. Instead of bits, quantum computers use qubits, which can exist in multiple states simultaneously thanks to phenomena like superposition and entanglement. This allows quantum computers to process a vast number of possibilities at once, potentially solving certain problems much faster than traditional computers.",
    "In machine learning, overfitting occurs when a model is trained too well on the training data, capturing noise or random fluctuations as if they were significant patterns. This results in a model that performs very well on the training data but poorly on new, unseen data. Techniques like cross-validation and regularization are commonly employed to avoid overfitting, ensuring the model can generalize better to new data.",
    "CRISPR-Cas9 is a groundbreaking gene-editing technology that allows scientists to make precise changes to the DNA of organisms. The system functions like molecular scissors, guided by a strand of RNA that matches the targeted DNA sequence, allowing Cas9 to cut the DNA at a specific location. This precision editing can be used to correct genetic disorders, improve crop resilience, or study gene functions in detail.",
    "In renewable energy systems, photovoltaic (PV) cells convert sunlight directly into electricity through the photovoltaic effect. Materials such as silicon absorb photons from sunlight, causing electrons to become excited and jump to a higher energy state. This movement of electrons creates an electrical current, which can be captured and used as a power source, reducing reliance on fossil fuels and mitigating greenhouse gas emissions.",
    "The HTTP/2 protocol is a major revision of the HTTP network protocol and has been designed to improve the speed and performance of web communications. It achieves this by allowing multiple concurrent exchanges between client and server over the same connection, minimizing latency. Additionally, it incorporates header compression to reduce overhead, and it enables servers to push responses proactively into client caches, further optimizing communication between browsers and servers.",
    "Deep learning models, particularly those known as deep neural networks (DNNs), are designed to learn hierarchical representations of data. By using multiple processing layers, DNNs can learn complex and abstract features at each layer, with higher-level features built from lower-level ones. These capabilities make them exceptionally good for tasks like speech recognition, language translation, and image recognition, as they can learn directly from raw data without the need for manual feature selection.",
    "A microservice architecture is a way of designing software applications as a collection of loosely coupled services. Each service is a self-contained piece of business functionality with its own interface and can be developed, deployed, and scaled independently. This allows for more flexible and resilient systems that can be updated quickly, but it also requires careful design to manage service interactions and data consistency.",
    "The principle of immunotherapy in cancer treatment is to stimulate the patient's own immune system to target and destroy cancer cells. It can be achieved through various means, including the introduction of antibodies that attach to cancer cells, making them more visible to the immune system, or by administering immune checkpoint inhibitors, which unleash an immune response against the cancer. This approach has shown promise in treating certain types of cancer and is often considered for patients who do not respond well to traditional treatments."
  ]
}

    "In a dystopian future, a group of rebels, led by the charismatic and enigmatic Alex, stood against the tyrannical regime that controlled their city.     "In a crowded city in the 1950s, Ellie, a shy typist, dreamed of becoming a jazz singer. By day, she faced the monotony of her office job, but by night, she sang in a smoky club.     "During the Gold Rush, a family traveled west in search of fortune. They battled harsh terrain, illness, and bandits.     "In a fantasy realm, a knight named Sir Cedric embarked on a quest to slay a dragon that terrorized his kingdom.     "When a global pandemic struck, Dr. Eliza Grantham tirelessly worked in her lab to develop a vaccine. {
  "name": "Instructional Summarization",
  "description": "Instructional summarization is about summarizing texts that contain instructions or procedural information. It aims to streamline the steps, rules, or guidelines presented, ensuring the essential details for performing a task remain clear and actionable. This subtask is critical for creating concise how-to guides, manuals, or recipes.",
  "system_prompt": "Summarize the instructions from the text, preserving clarity and actionability of the steps or guidelines.",
  "data": [
    "To change a flat tire, begin by parking on a stable, flat surface and applying the parking brake. Remove the hubcap and loosen the lug nuts with a wrench. Then, use a jack to lift the car off the ground and remove the lug nuts completely. Take off the flat tire, replace it with the spare, and re-secure the lug nuts without tightening them fully. Lower the car, remove the jack, and then fully tighten the lug nuts. Finish by replacing the hubcap.",
    "For a basic omelette, start by beating two eggs with salt and pepper. Heat a non-stick frying pan and add a knob of butter, swirling it to coat the pan. Pour in the eggs and cook over medium heat. As the eggs set, push the cooked edges towards the center, allowing the liquid to flow underneath. Once the omelette is set but still creamy on top, add your chosen filling on one half, then fold the omelette in half. Cook for another minute, then slide onto a plate and serve.",
    "When setting up a new smartphone, begin by charging the device fully. Power on the phone and select your language. Connect to Wi-Fi and log in to your Google or Apple account. Follow the prompts to set up a security feature, such as a PIN code or biometric authentication. Restore data from a backup if necessary. Finish by customizing settings, such as ringtone, wallpaper, and app layout, to your preference.",
    "To prepare the garden for planting, start by clearing the area of weeds and debris. Test the soil pH and adjust as necessary using lime for acidic soil or sulfur for alkaline soil. Add compost to enrich the soil. Plan your garden layout, considering sunlight and plant spacing. Dig holes or rows at the appropriate depth for your seeds or seedlings. Plant the seeds or seedlings, water thoroughly, and mulch to retain moisture and prevent weeds.",
    "For a simple lemonade recipe, squeeze the juice of four lemons and pour it into a pitcher. Add 1/2 cup of sugar and stir to dissolve. Fill the pitcher with 6 cups of cold water and stir well. Taste and adjust sweetness if necessary. Refrigerate until cold, or serve immediately with ice cubes. Garnish with lemon slices or mint for extra flavor.",
    "To perform a system restore on a Windows computer, start by ensuring that all important files are backed up. Navigate to the Control Panel and select 'System and Security.' Click 'System,' and then choose 'System Protection' on the left panel. Click on 'System Restore' and follow the wizard to select a restore point. Confirm your choice and start the restore process. The computer will restart during this process.",
    "When making coffee using a French press, begin by boiling water and then let it cool for one minute to reach the ideal temperature. Add one tablespoon of coarsely ground coffee per cup to the French press. Pour the hot water over the coffee grounds, stir briefly, and place the lid on top with the plunger pulled up. Wait for four minutes, then slowly press the plunger down. Serve the coffee immediately.",
    "To back up your iPhone to iCloud, ensure that your device is connected to Wi-Fi. Go to 'Settings,' tap your name, and then select 'iCloud.' Scroll down and select 'iCloud Backup.' If it's not already turned on, enable the 'iCloud Backup' toggle. Tap 'Back Up Now' to start the backup process and wait for it to complete, ensuring the device stays connected to Wi-Fi throughout.",
    "For a basic yoga routine, start in a comfortable seated position, focusing on your breath for a few minutes. Move into a series of sun salutations to warm up your body. Include standing poses, such as Warrior I and II, to build strength. Transition to seated forward bends and twists for flexibility. Finally, end with Shavasana, lying down on your back and relaxing every muscle for several minutes to absorb the benefits of the practice.",
    "To bind a book at home, print your pages and stack them in order. Make a cover slightly larger than the pages from thick cardstock or use an old hardcover book. Align the pages and cover, then clamp them together. Make evenly spaced holes along the binding edge with an awl. Thread a needle with strong thread and sew through the holes in a pattern that loops around the spine. Tie off the thread and trim excess. Glue the first and last pages to the cover for a neat finish."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Instructional Summarization",
  "description": "Instructional summarization is about summarizing texts that contain instructions or procedural information. It aims to streamline the steps, rules, or guidelines presented, ensuring the essential details for performing a task remain clear and actionable. This subtask is critical for creating concise how-to guides, manuals, or recipes.",
  "system_prompt": "Summarize the instructions from the text, preserving clarity and actionability of the steps or guidelines.",
  "data": [
    "To make the perfect boiled egg, start by placing your eggs in a saucepan. Cover them with an inch of cold water. Slowly bring water to a boil over medium-high heat. Once the water is boiling, cover, and remove from heat. Let them sit in the hot water for 4-12 minutes, depending on how you like your eggs. Then remove, cool in ice water, and peel.",
    "Assembling the bookshelf involves laying out all the provided pieces and hardware. Then, you attach the side panels to the base using the screws and dowels. Once the sides are secure, insert the back panel. Afterward, you can put in the shelves at your desired height, securing them with the remaining screws. To finish, affix the top panel and ensure the bookshelf is stable before use.",
    "To reset your phone to factory settings, backup your data first. Then, go to the settings menu, select 'System,' followed by 'Reset Options.' Choose 'Erase all data (factory reset)' and tap 'Reset Phone.' If prompted, enter your device's PIN, password, or pattern. Confirm your choice and wait for the phone to reset.",
    "To create a new Google account, go to the Google account sign-up page. Enter your first and last name, choose a username, and set a password. Next, provide a backup email address, your birth date, and your gender. Finally, agree to the terms of service and privacy policy. Once done, click the 'Next step' button to finalize the creation of your account.",
    "When baking chocolate chip cookies, preheat your oven and gather all ingredients. Cream together the butter and sugars until fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the mixture. Mix in the flour, chocolate chips, and nuts. Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans. Bake until the edges are nicely browned.",
    "Changing a car tire starts with parking on a level surface and applying the parking brake. Use the lug wrench to loosen the lug nuts but do not remove them completely. Lift the vehicle off the ground with a jack. Remove the lug nuts and pull the wheel off the car. Mount the spare tire, hand-tighten the lug nuts, lower the car, and then tighten the lug nuts in a star pattern.",
    "To plant a garden, first choose a location that gets plenty of sunlight and has good drainage. Prepare the soil by tilling and adding compost. Then, select your plants or seeds and plant them at the recommended spacing and depth. Water the garden immediately after planting and continue to water according to the needs of the plants. As the plants grow, weed regularly and provide support for taller plants if necessary.",
    "In Excel, to create a pivot table, first select the data range you want to analyze. Click on the 'Insert' tab and then select 'PivotTable.' Choose where you want the PivotTable report to be placed. Click 'OK,' and then drag fields to the desired areas in the PivotTable field list. Finally, adjust the layout and format as needed to analyze your data.",
    "When applying for a passport, you must complete the application form DS-11. Provide proof of U.S. citizenship and a photocopy of that proof. Submit a passport photo that meets the requirements. Present a valid ID and a photocopy of that ID. Pay the application fee with an acceptable form of payment. Finally, mail your application or submit it in person at an acceptance facility.",
    "To set up a wireless router, start by unplugging your modem. Connect the router to the modem with an Ethernet cable, then plug in both devices. Wait for the modem to connect to the internet. Next, connect to the router's network on your computer or mobile device. Use a web browser to access the router's setup page, where you can configure your network name and password."
  ]
}

Information Extraction.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.

{
  "name": "Key Phrase Extraction",
  "description": "This subtask is focused on identifying important phrases within the text that capture significant themes or concepts.",
  "system_prompt": "Extract key phrases from the following text to highlight its main themes and concepts.",
  "data": [
    "The global economy is facing unprecedented challenges as it grapples with the COVID-19 pandemic. Supply chains have been disrupted, unemployment rates have soared, and many small businesses have closed their doors permanently. Policymakers are contemplating stimulus packages to rejuvenate economic growth and provide relief to those who have been hardest hit.",
    "Climate change poses a serious threat to our planet, with rising sea levels, devastating wildfires, and extreme weather events becoming increasingly common. It is imperative that international cooperation is strengthened and sustainable practices are adopted to mitigate the impact of global warming and to safeguard the environment for future generations.",
    "Advancements in artificial intelligence are rapidly transforming industries, automating tasks that were once thought to require human intelligence. As AI becomes more integrated into various sectors, the workforce must adapt, acquiring new skills and redefining their roles within an evolving technological landscape.",
    "The importance of cybersecurity has been magnified by the digital revolution. With personal information and critical infrastructure at risk of cyber-attacks, governments and corporations are investing heavily in protective measures to guard against data breaches and to ensure the integrity of online systems.",
    "Nutrition science has discovered the profound impact that diet has on health and well-being. Consuming a balanced diet, rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, can prevent many chronic diseases and improve quality of life. Public health initiatives focus on education and access to healthy food choices as key components in building a healthier society.",
    "Social media has altered the way we communicate, interact, and receive information. While it has enabled the rapid dissemination of knowledge and connected people across the globe, it also poses challenges related to misinformation, privacy, and the mental health of its users. The debate on regulation and ethical responsibility continues to evolve in this digital age.",
    "The rise of remote work has reshaped the traditional workplace. Flexibility, increased productivity, and better work-life balance are cited amongst its benefits. However, it also introduces challenges in team cohesion, communication, and the blurring of work-home boundaries.",
    "Urbanization trends indicate a steady increase in people moving to cities in search of better employment and education opportunities. This has implications for infrastructure, housing, public transportation, and social services, which must evolve to accommodate the growing urban population.",
    "The global travel industry has taken a significant hit due to travel restrictions and safety concerns during the pandemic. Recovery strategies focus on enhancing health precautions, promoting local tourism, and utilizing technology to provide innovative travel experiences while adapting to the new normal.",
    "E-commerce has revolutionized the retail landscape, enabling consumers to shop from the comfort of their homes. The convenience, variety, and competitive pricing of online shopping have led to its massive growth. Retailers are adapting to this shift by developing robust online platforms and rethinking their brick-and-mortar strategies."
  ]
}

  "name": "Fact Extraction",
  "description": "The aim of this subtask is to identify and extract factual statements from the text.",
  "system_prompt": "Distinguish and retrieve factual data from the input text, excluding opinions or speculative information.",
  "data": [
    "The Nile is the longest river in the world, stretching approximately 4,135 miles across several African countries, including Egypt and Sudan.     "Mount Everest, with a peak elevation of 29,029 feet above sea level, is recognized as the highest mountain on Earth. It is part of the Himalayan range in Asia and lies on the border between Nepal and the autonomous region of Tibet in China.",

    "Leonardo da Vinci, an Italian polymath of the High Renaissance, is widely considered one of the most diversely talented individuals ever to have lived.     "The Internet was developed in the late 1960s to ensure that communication could withstand nuclear attacks. It was initially called the ARPANET and was funded by the U.S. Department of Defense.",
    "The human brain is composed of approximately 86 billion neurons, each interconnected by synapses, which play a critical role in transmitting signals throughout the body. Adult brains weigh about 3 pounds and are made up of about 60% fat, making it the fattiest organ in the human body.",
    "Photosynthesis in plants generally involves the green pigment chlorophyll and generates oxygen as a byproduct. The overall equation for photosynthesis is 6 CO2 + 6 H2O + light energy → C6H12O6 + 6 O2, which denotes the conversion of carbon dioxide and water into glucose and oxygen.",
    "Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still preserved. This is due to the natural preservatives in honey, such as low water activity and high acidity, which inhibit the growth of microorganisms.",
    "The city of Venice in Italy is renowned for its canals, which serve as important transportation routes. It consists of a series of 118 small islands separated by canals and linked by over 400 bridges, with the Grand Canal being the largest and most famous."

Translation.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.
subtasks:
{
  "name": "Literal Translation",
  "description": "This subtask involves translating the text word-for-word from the source language to the target language. It pays close attention to the original grammar and vocabulary without adding interpretation or stylistic changes. The objective is to produce a translation that is as close as possible to the exact wording of the original text. Translate from English to French.",
  "system_prompt": "Translate the following English text into French literally, preserving the original grammar and vocabulary.",
  "data": [
    "The cat sat on the mat.",
    "She opened the door slowly and peeked outside.",
    "He often wondered what it would be like to travel through space.",

    "She had an unusual way of looking at the world.",

{
  "name": "Technical Translation",
  "description": "The focus of this subtask is on texts that contain specialized vocabulary, such as scientific, engineering, or legal documentation. It necessitates a deep understanding of the subject matter to accurately convert technical terms and concepts. The aim is to provide a precise and clear translation that maintains the integrity of the specialized content. Translate from German to French.",
  "system_prompt": "Translate the following German technical text into French, ensuring all specialized terms are accurately conveyed.",
  "data": [
    "Die elektrische Leitfähigkeit wird durch die Beweglichkeit der Elektronen im Leitermaterial bestimmt. Bei höheren Temperaturen kann die Leitfähigkeit eines Metalls abnehmen, da die Atomgitter-Schwingungen zunehmen und die Elektronenbewegung stören.",
    "Eine Photovoltaikzelle besteht aus mehreren Schichten unterschiedlicher Halbleitermaterialien, die Sonnenlicht direkt in elektrischen Strom umwandeln. Die Effizienz einer Zelle hängt von der Absorptionsrate der einfallenden Lichtpartikel ab.",
    "In einem abgeschlossenen thermodynamischen System nähert sich die Entropie im Laufe der Zeit einem Maximum an. Dieses Konzept ist als Zweiter Hauptsatz der Thermodynamik bekannt und spielt eine zentrale Rolle in der Energielehre.",
    "Der Algorithmus zur Datenverschlüsselung verwendet asymmetrische Schlüssel, wobei der öffentliche Schlüssel zum Verschlüsseln und der private Schlüssel zum Entschlüsseln der Informationen dient. Diese Methode gewährleistet die Sicherheit der übertragenen Daten.",
    "Hydraulische Systeme nutzen die inkompressible Natur von Flüssigkeiten, um Energie über Distanzen zu übertragen. Der Hauptvorteil dieses Systems ist die Fähigkeit, große Kräfte mit relativ geringem Energieaufwand zu erzeugen.",
    "Die Biotechnologie nutzt lebende Organismen oder Teile davon, um Produkte zu entwickeln oder zu verbessern. Sie hat Anwendungen in verschiedenen Bereichen wie Medizin, Landwirtschaft und Umweltwissenschaften.",
    "Der Impedanzspektroskopie liegt das Prinzip zugrunde, dass die elektrische Impedanz einer Probe Frequenzabhängig ist. Diese Technik wird in der Materialwissenschaft verwendet, um Eigenschaften wie die Feuchtigkeitsaufnahme von Polymeren zu untersuchen.",
    "Die Statik ist ein Teilgebiet der Mechanik, das sich mit der Analyse von Kräften in ruhenden Systemen beschäftigt. Ein fundamentales Konzept ist das Gleichgewicht, bei dem die Summe aller Kräfte und Momente Null ist.",
    "Die DNA-Sequenzierung ermöglicht es Wissenschaftlern, die genaue Abfolge der Nukleotide in einem DNA-Molekül zu bestimmen. Dies ist entscheidend für das Verständnis genetischer Informationen und für die medizinische Forschung.",
    "Das Ohmsche Gesetz ist ein grundlegendes Prinzip in der Elektrotechnik und besagt, dass der Strom durch einen Leiter zwischen zwei Punkten direkt proportional zur Spannung über dem Leiter und umgekehrt proportional zum Widerstand des Leiters ist."
  ]
}

    "Die Photovoltaikzelle wandelt Licht direkt in Elektrizität um und nutzt dafür den photovoltaischen Effekt. Die Effizienz der Umwandlung hängt von dem Material der Zelle und der Wellenlänge des Lichtes ab.",
    "Die Entsorgung von chemischen Abfällen erfordert besondere Sicherheitsmaßnahmen, um die Umwelt und die menschliche Gesundheit zu schützen. Gesetze schreiben genaue Verfahren für den Umgang und die Beseitigung dieser Stoffe vor.",
    "Der Algorithmus für die Verschlüsselung von Daten muss sowohl sicher als auch effizient sein, um den Schutz von sensiblen Informationen bei gleichzeitiger Gewährleistung einer schnellen Datenverarbeitung zu ermöglichen.",

    "Please instruct the patient to take 500 mg of Amoxicillin orally three times a day for a period of seven days to treat the bacterial infection.",
    "The echocardiogram indicates a dilated left atrium and ventricle with reduced ejection fraction, indicative of chronic heart failure. The patient should be alerted to the importance of managing their condition.",

    "An MRI scan of the cranial region showed no signs of intracranial hemorrhage, but there are multiple lesions present that are suggestive of demyelinating disease, such as multiple sclerosis.",
    "This spirometry test reveals a reduced FEV1/FVC ratio, which is consistent with an obstructive pulmonary pattern; likely indicative of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).",

    "The histopathological analysis confirmed the presence of basal cell carcinoma. Surgical excision of the lesion with a margin of healthy tissue is the recommended course of action.",
    "In light of the patient's reported allergic reaction to penicillin, alternative antibiotics such as azithromycin should be considered for the treatment of their streptococcal pharyngitis."

}

{
  "name": "Semantic Translation",
  "description": "Semantic translation prioritizes the meaning and concepts behind the words of the original text. The translator interprets the text and renders it in the target language with the intent to convey the same ideas. The goal is to maintain the integrity of the original message within the cultural context of the target language. Translate from German to Mandarin.",
  "system_prompt": "Interpret and translate the following German text into Mandarin, focusing on conveying its underlying ideas.",
  "data": [
    "Technology hat unser tägliches Leben so durchdrungen, dass moderne Gesellschaften ohne sie kaum noch funktionieren würden.",
    "Die Schönheit der Natur sollte niemals unterschätzt werden, da sie eine Quelle der Inspiration und Ruhe für uns alle darstellt.",

    "Die literarische Welt ist so vielfältig und breitgefächert, dass sie für jeden etwas zu bieten hat – unabhängig von Alter, Geschlecht oder Hintergrund.",
    "Die Kunst des Kochens ist nicht nur eine Frage des Geschmacks, sondern auch des Gespürs für die richtigen Zutaten und deren harmonische Kombination.",
    "Traditionen zu bewahren ist wichtig, aber wir müssen offen für Veränderungen sein, die unsere Gesellschaft zum Besseren hin weiterentwickeln.",
    "Ein guter Führer zeichnet sich nicht nur durch seine Entscheidungskraft aus, sondern auch durch seine Fähigkeit, Mitgefühl und Verständnis für seine Mitmenschen zu zeigen.",
    "Musik hat die einzigartige Fähigkeit, Menschen miteinander zu verbinden, über kulturelle und sprachliche Barrieren hinweg."

}

Document Classification.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.
subtasks:
{
  "name": "Topic Identification",
  "description": "In this subtask, the goal is to determine the main topic or topics that the document covers.",
  "system_prompt": "Determine the main topic of the following text to identify its primary category.",
  "data": [
    "Recent archaeological discoveries have shed light on the methods used by the ancient Egyptians to construct their pyramids. Scientists have analyzed tool marks on the stone and have studied the logistics involved in transporting the limestone blocks from quarries.",
    "The latest software update includes a variety of security improvements. New encryption protocols have been implemented, making it much more difficult for unauthorized users to access sensitive information.",
    "Climate change is aggravating the intensity of hurricanes. Warmer ocean temperatures contribute to the increased water vapor in the atmosphere, fueling the strength of these storms and extending their destructive potential.",
    "The novel tells the story of Emily, a young woman grappling with the loss of her family. The narrative explores themes of grief, resilience, and the journey towards self-discovery.",
    "The documentary focuses on the plight of endangered species, emphasizing the urgent need for conservation efforts. Interviews with biologists and activists highlight the challenges and potential strategies for protecting biodiversity.",
    "Market analysis indicates a growing trend in plant-based diets, as consumers are increasingly concerned about health and sustainability. Food companies are responding by expanding their range of vegan products to meet this rising demand.",
    "A retrospective art exhibition showcases the evolution of 20th-century abstract painting. The collection includes works from various artists, highlighting their experimental techniques and the cultural influences that shaped their artistic expressions.",
    "Advancements in artificial intelligence are transforming the automotive industry. Autonomous vehicles are no longer a distant future concept, with several manufacturers already testing their driverless cars on public roads.",
    "The history podcast's latest episode discusses the fall of the Roman Empire. It examines the political, economic, and social factors that led to the empire's gradual decline and the subsequent rise of successor states.",
    "The guidebook outlines the best hiking trails in the Pacific Northwest, providing detailed maps, difficulty ratings, and tips on the best times to visit. It also includes information on the region's flora and fauna, making it an invaluable resource for nature enthusiasts."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Topic Identification",
  "description": "In this subtask, the goal is to determine the main topic or topics that the document covers.",
  "system_prompt": "Determine the main topic of the following text to identify its primary category.",
  "data": [
    "The history of Ancient Rome is marked by legendary tales and monumental achievements. From the foundation of the city by the twin brothers Romulus and Remus to the establishment of the Roman Republic, followed by the era of the Roman Empire, each phase of Roman history is filled with remarkable figures, from senators to emperors, and groundbreaking events that continue to fascinate historians and archaeologists today.",

    "Photosynthesis is a crucial biological process that occurs within green plant cells. This process involves the conversion of light energy into chemical energy, which is stored as sugars. Vital for plant growth, photosynthesis also plays a significant role in maintaining atmospheric oxygen levels and is an integral part of the carbon cycle.",

    "The genre of science fiction often explores imaginative concepts based on advanced science and technology, space exploration, time travel, and parallel universes. Stories within this genre frequently address the potential consequences of scientific innovations on society and individuals, presenting futuristic scenarios that stimulate both thought and entertainment.",

    "In the culinary world, French cuisine is heralded for its finesse and flavor. Key ingredients include herbs, cheese, and wine, which chefs use in a variety of techniques to create iconic dishes such as coq au vin, bouillabaisse, and ratatouille. These dishes are not only a treat to the palate but also embody the rich cultural heritage of France.",

    "The rise of cryptocurrency has introduced a new paradigm in the financial sector. Digital currencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum operate on blockchain technology and offer an alternative to traditional fiat money. This shift has sparked debates on financial privacy, security, and the role of decentralized systems in the modern economy.",

    "In the field of psychology, the study of human behavior and mental processes is paramount. Various approaches, such as cognitive, behavioral, and psychodynamic, provide insights into how individuals perceive the world, process emotions, and react to different stimuli, thereby shaping their overall psychological well-being.",

    "Climate change represents one of the most pressing challenges of our time, characterized by global warming, melting polar ice caps, and rising sea levels. Human activities, particularly the emission of greenhouse gases, are major contributors to these environmental shifts, necessitating immediate and sustained action to mitigate their impact.",

    "Shakespeare's works are celebrated for their intricate storytelling and profound exploration of human nature. His plays, such as 'Hamlet', 'Othello', and 'Macbeth', delve into themes of ambition, power, betrayal, and love, providing a timeless commentary on the complexities and tragedies of life.",

    "Quantum mechanics is a fundamental theory in physics that provides a description of the physical properties of nature at the scale of atoms and subatomic particles. It challenges classical mechanics with concepts like wave-particle duality and quantum entanglement, revolutionizing our understanding of the microscopic world.",

    "The Internet of Things (IoT) is a network of interconnected devices that communicate with each other through the internet. By integrating sensors and smart systems, IoT enables the automation and optimization of various daily tasks and industrial processes, contributing to more efficient energy use, improved health outcomes, and enhanced quality of life."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Topic Identification",
  "description": "In this subtask, the goal is to determine the main topic or topics that the document covers.",
  "system_prompt": "Determine the main topic of the following text to identify its primary category.",
  "data": [
    "As the climate warms, polar ice caps and glaciers continue to melt at an alarming rate. This is causing sea levels to rise, which increases the risk of coastal flooding. Scientists are urging policymakers to take immediate action to reduce greenhouse gas emissions in order to mitigate the worst effects of climate change.",
    "Quantum computing is poised to revolutionize the way we solve complex problems. By leveraging the principles of quantum mechanics, quantum computers can process information at speeds previously thought impossible. This has vast implications for fields such as cryptography, finance, and drug discovery.",
    "The Renaissance was a period of great cultural and artistic flourishing in Europe. It marked a significant departure from the Middle Ages and saw a resurgence in the values and aesthetics of classical antiquity. This era gave birth to many of the masterpieces of art and architecture that continue to captivate audiences around the world today.",
    "Recent advances in artificial intelligence have been transformative across numerous industries. AI-driven automation has improved efficiency in manufacturing, while machine learning algorithms have revolutionized data analysis. The ethics of AI usage, however, remain a contentious topic.",
    "The ketogenic diet, characterized by low carbohydrate intake and high fat consumption, has gained popularity as a weight loss strategy. Advocates claim it helps to reduce appetite and improve metabolism, while critics warn of potential nutritional deficiencies and side effects.",
    "Blockchain technology provides a decentralized ledger that records transactions securely and transparently. It is the foundation of cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, but its potential applications extend far beyond digital currencies, from supply chain management to voting systems.",
    "Mindfulness meditation, a practice that involves focusing one's attention on the present moment, has been shown to reduce stress and improve mental well-being. It often incorporates elements such as breath awareness and has become increasingly popular in the West as a technique for maintaining mental health.",
    "The study of linguistics encompasses a broad range of topics, from the structure and evolution of language to the way children acquire their first language. Linguists seek to understand not just individual languages, but the general properties that all languages share.",
    "The Impressionist movement in painting was characterized by a focus on light and its changing qualities, often with an emphasis on the experience of the artist rather than an accurate representation of reality. Artists like Claude Monet and Edgar Degas sought to capture the sensory effect of a scene rather than its details.",
    "The human digestive system is a complex series of organs and processes that break down food to extract energy and nutrients. Understanding how this system works is crucial to addressing issues such as malnutrition, obesity, and gastrointestinal diseases."
  ]
}

Keyword Extraction.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.
subtasks:

  "name": "Frequency-Based Keyword Extraction",

These relationships are often defined by the flow of energy, the cycling of nutrients, and the various trophic levels. Named Entity Recognition.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.

    "Under Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union, any member state may decide to withdraw from the Union in accordance with its own constitutional requirements, as the United Kingdom did with Brexit.",
    "The Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 was passed to protect investors from the possibility of fraudulent accounting activities by corporations, following major scandals such as Enron and WorldCom.",
    "The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) has been instrumental in reshaping the way organizations across the European Union approach data privacy, giving citizens more control over their personal information.",
    "The Paris Agreement, under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, deals with greenhouse gas emissions mitigation, adaptation, and finance, starting in the year 2020.",
    "The Supreme Court's interpretation of the Second Amendment in the District of Columbia v. Heller case has had a lasting impact on gun control laws, affirming an individual's right to possess a firearm unconnected with service in a militia.",
    "The Magna Carta, originally issued in the year 1215, has become a cornerstone of English liberties, influencing the development of common law and constitutional principles throughout the world.",
    "Companies must adhere to the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA), which prohibits the payment of bribes to foreign officials to assist in obtaining or retaining business.",
    "The Clean Air Act, established by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), sets national air quality standards and aims to limit emissions of hazardous pollutants to protect public health and the environment."
  ]
}

Sentiment Analysis.descr: This category includes classical NLP tasks that involve the handling, interpretation, and retrieval of information. It encompasses activities where the primary goal is to manage and utilize existing knowledge or data.
subtasks:
{
  "name": "Polarity Identification",
  "description": "This subtask involves identifying the overall sentiment polarity of the text, without delving into the specifics of emotion or intensity. It aims to classify the text into broad categories such as positive, negative, or neutral. The result provides a quick and general sense of the emotional tone conveyed by the text.",
  "system_prompt": "Identify the sentiment polarity of the following text, classifying it as positive, negative, or neutral.",
  "data": [
    "It's been an incredible journey, and I'm thrilled to see the impact our work is making. The community's support has been overwhelming, and we're just getting started on our mission to make a difference.",
    "I've always believed that when one door closes, another one opens. This experience has taught me that perseverance is key, and optimism is a powerful force.",
    "There is nothing more demotivating than putting your heart and soul into a project, only to have it criticized and rejected by your peers. It feels like all that effort was for nothing.",
    "Today was just an ordinary day with nothing significant happening. I completed my usual tasks at work, had lunch at the cafeteria, and came home.",
    "The beauty of the sunset left me speechless; it was a moment of pure bliss and serenity. Such simple pleasures are truly the essence of a life well-lived.",
    "The company's quarterly report revealed a staggering loss, leading to a significant drop in stock prices and raising concerns about its future stability.",
    "The meeting was an absolute waste of time, with no progress made on any of the pressing issues. It's frustrating when discussions go in circles without any resolution.",
    "After years of hard work and dedication, the team finally celebrated the successful launch of the new product, which was met with fantastic reviews and promising sales figures.",
    "The film was a mediocre affair, neither impressing the audience with its plot nor disappointing them with any significant flaws. It was a movie that one could easily forget.",
    "The silence in the aftermath of the argument was deafening. Each person retreated into their own thoughts, reflecting on the harsh words that had been exchanged."
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Emotion Detection",
  "description": "The aim of this subtask is to detect specific emotions, such as joy, anger, sadness, or surprise, that are expressed in the text. It goes beyond simple polarity to understand the nuances of emotional expression. Doing so can provide deeper insights into the text's emotional subtext and the author's intent.",
  "system_prompt": "Detect and label specific emotions like joy, anger, sadness, or surprise in the following text.",
  "data": [
    "Lily raced to the window when she heard the familiar jingle of the ice cream truck. Her eyes sparkled with excitement as she clasped a handful of coins in her little fist, laughing joyously at the prospect of her favorite chocolate cone.",
    "His hands trembled as he read the rejection letter for the tenth time. Despite his efforts to suppress it, a wave of sadness washed over him, leaving him feeling helpless and alone in his dimly-lit room.",
    "It was at the very moment the birthday candles were blown out that the lights went out too. In the pitch-black room, a chorus of surprised gasps and laughter rose among the crowd, turning the unexpected event into a memorable one.",
    "Clara stared at the wedding dress, her heart heavy with the knowledge that she would never wear it. The sadness in her eyes was palpable as she gently folded the delicate fabric and placed it back into the box.",
    "The team erupted in cheers, throwing their hats into the air as the final whistle blew. The joy of victory was evident on every player's face, their months of hard work and dedication finally paying off in a glorious win.",
    "The venom in her voice was unmistakable as she recounted the betrayal of her closest friend. Anger flashed in her eyes, and her fists clenched involuntarily as she struggled to keep her composure.",
    "Mark's surprise couldn't be contained when he found his lost childhood teddy bear in a box in the attic. The joy mixed with a touch of nostalgic sadness brought a tear to his eye as he hugged the old toy close.",
    "The sudden crash from the kitchen followed by his cat's scampering feet sent a jolt of surprise through him. His initial shock quickly turned into laughter upon discovering the mess of spilled flour his mischievous pet had caused.",
    "The entire audience held its breath as the acrobat slipped, a collective gasp of fear and surprise echoing through the circus tent. Then, almost miraculously, she regained her balance and continued her performance to a thunderous applause.",
    "Feeling the weight of his words, she could no longer hold back the tears of sadness. Her dream of reconciliation was now a distant mirage, dissolving as the finality of their conversation set in."
  ]
}

  "name": "Sentiment Trend Analysis",

  "system_prompt": "Analyze the sentiment trend over the following series of texts to identify any emerging patterns.",
